mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_waybill_renter ( waybill_renter_code, renter_id, owner_id, payment_code, courier_name, waybill_number, waybill_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{waybillRenterCode}, #{renterId}, #{ownerId}, #{paymentCode}, #{courierName}, #{waybillNumber}, NOW() );

INSERT INTO tb_waybill_owner ( waybill_owner_code, owner_id, renter_id, payment_code, courier_name, waybill_number, waybill_reg_date ) VALUES ( #{waybillOwnerCode}, #{ownerId}, #{renterId}, #{paymentCode}, #{courierName}, #{waybillNumber}, NOW() );

INSERT INTO tb_payment ( payment_code, goods_code, rental_code, user_id, region_sgg_code, user_addr_desc, payment_account_or_card_number, payment_agency, payment_type, expected_payment_amount, goods_commision_total_price, mileage_use_price, save_mileage, amount_excluding_mileage, settlement_amount, payment_time, trade_status_code, mileage_save_group_code, mileage_use_group_code ) VALUES ( #{paymentCode}, #{goodsCode}, #{rentalCode}, #{userId}, #{regionSggCode}, #{userAddrDesc}, #{paymentAccountOrCardNumber}, #{paymentAgency}, #{paymentType}, #{expectedPaymentAmount}, #{goodsCommisionTotalPrice}, #{mileageUsePrice}, #{saveMileage}, #{amountExcludingMileage}, #{settlementAmount}, NOW(), 'trade_status1', #{mileageSaveGroupCode}, #{mileageUseGroupCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT l.user_level_rate FROM tb_user AS u INNER JOIN tb_user_level AS l ON u.user_level_code = l.user_level_code WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT comi.commision_rate FROM tb_commision_rate AS comi WHERE comi.apply_check = TRUE;
SELECT REPLACE(SUBSTRING(ren.rental_order_date, 1, 10), '-','') FROM tb_rental AS ren WHERE ren.rental_code =#{rentalCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_rental ( rental_code, goods_code, user_id, rental_start_date, rental_end_date, select_delivery, rental_order_date ) VALUES ( #{rentalCode}, #{goodsCode}, #{userId}, #{rentalStartDate}, #{rentalEndDate}, #{selectDelivery}, NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT sgg.region_sgg_code ,sgg.region_sgg_name FROM tb_region_sgg AS sgg WHERE sgg.region_sido_code = #{regionSidoCode};

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc, rs.region_sido_code, rs.region_sgg_code FROM tb_user AS u INNER JOIN tb_region_sgg AS rs ON u.region_sgg_code = rs.region_sgg_code WHERE u.user_id = #{loginId};
SELECT wayo.courier_name, wayo.waybill_number, wayo.payment_code FROM tb_waybill_owner AS wayo WHERE wayo.renter_id = #{userId} AND payment_code = #{paymentCode};
SELECT wayr.courier_name, wayr.waybill_number, wayr.payment_code FROM tb_waybill_renter AS wayr WHERE wayr.owner_id = #{userId} AND payment_code = #{paymentCode};

SELECT ren.rental_code, g.user_id, g.goods_name, pay.payment_code, sgg.region_sgg_name, sido.region_sido_name, pay.user_addr_desc, ren.rental_start_date, ren.rental_end_date, pay.expected_payment_amount, pay.goods_commision_total_price, pay.settlement_amount, pay.payment_agency, pay.payment_type, pay.payment_account_or_card_number, tra.order_state_standard_name, ren.rental_order_date, g.goods_rental_availability FROM tb_rental AS ren INNER JOIN tb_payment AS pay ON ren.rental_code = pay.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ren.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_trade_status AS tra ON pay.trade_status_code = tra.trade_status_code INNER JOIN tb_region_sgg AS sgg ON sgg.region_sgg_code = pay.region_sgg_code INNER JOIN tb_region_sido AS sido ON sido.region_sido_code = sgg.region_sido_code WHERE ren.rental_code = #{rentalCode};

SELECT ren.rental_code, ren.user_id, g.goods_name, pay.payment_code, sgg.region_sgg_name, sido.region_sido_name, pay.user_addr_desc, ren.rental_start_date, ren.rental_end_date, pay.expected_payment_amount, pay.goods_commision_total_price, pay.settlement_amount, pay.payment_agency, pay.payment_type, pay.payment_account_or_card_number, tra.order_state_standard_name, ren.rental_order_date, g.goods_rental_availability FROM tb_rental AS ren INNER JOIN tb_payment AS pay ON ren.rental_code = pay.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ren.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_trade_status AS tra ON pay.trade_status_code = tra.trade_status_code INNER JOIN tb_region_sgg AS sgg ON sgg.region_sgg_code = pay.region_sgg_code INNER JOIN tb_region_sido AS sido ON sido.region_sido_code = sgg.region_sido_code WHERE ren.rental_code = #{rentalCode};
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_rental AS ren INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ren.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE ren.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT ren.rental_code, g.goods_name, pay.payment_code, ren.rental_start_date, ren.rental_end_date, pay.expected_payment_amount, pay.goods_commision_total_price, pay.settlement_amount, tra.order_state_standard_name, ren.rental_order_date, g.goods_rental_availability FROM tb_rental AS ren INNER JOIN tb_payment AS pay ON ren.rental_code = pay.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ren.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_trade_status AS tra ON pay.trade_status_code = tra.trade_status_code WHERE g.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(ren.rental_code,7) AS UNSIGNED) DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_rental AS ren WHERE ren.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT ren.rental_code, g.goods_name, pay.payment_code, ren.rental_start_date, ren.rental_end_date, pay.mileage_use_price, pay.amount_excluding_mileage, tra.order_state_standard_name, ren.rental_order_date FROM tb_rental AS ren INNER JOIN tb_payment AS pay ON ren.rental_code = pay.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ren.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_trade_status AS tra ON pay.trade_status_code = tra.trade_status_code WHERE ren.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(ren.rental_code,7) AS UNSIGNED) DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
